title: Is there any reason why you must link your ruqqus and discord accounts now?

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

it creates more friction so that atleast you can't raid it with bots. 

there is nothing more permanent than a temporary solution

post.title: Is there any reason why you must link your ruqqus and discord accounts now?

author.bio:
Ruqqus cofounder and lead backend developer.

https://github.com/captainmeta4
author.bio_html:
Ruqqus cofounder and lead backend developer.

https://github.com/captainmeta4

body:
It lets us put our own account security in front of Discord access, and provides naming consistency and (for customer service purposes) account ownership verification

It also does some cool stuff like apply a Premium role automatically, or shunt banned users into a dedicated appeals channel.
body_html:
It lets us put our own account security in front of Discord access, and provides naming consistency and (for customer service purposes) account ownership verification

It also does some cool stuff like apply a Premium role automatically, or shunt banned users into a dedicated appeals channel.

https://github.com/captainmeta4
author.bio_html:
Ruqqus cofounder and lead backend developer.

body: For a period of time, they were. Then a few days ago we had issues where a bunch of unlinked sleeper accounts were used to harass users, so at that point it was time for them to go.

post.title: Is there any reason why you must link your ruqqus and discord accounts now?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Because the admins want control and it's easier for them to ban you from both platforms. But I guarantee mods don't have to link because they're special and don't have to follow the rules.

body:
No, they were specifically DMing users from the discord one after another. This screenshot is from DMs, it was never posted in the fucking discord server.

This also goes against discord ToS, what the user is doing in the screenshot.

No, they were specifically DMing users from the discord one after another. This screenshot is from DMs, it was never posted in the fucking discord server.

guild.description_html:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
guild.name: Ruqqus

parent.body: You have to go to https://ruqqus.com/discord and sign in with your discord account
parent.body_html: You have to go to https://ruqqus.com/discord and sign in with your discord account

post.title: Is there any reason why you must link your ruqqus and discord accounts now?

author.bio:
Ruqqus is a [fraud](https://ruqqus.com/+TheoryOfRuqqus/post/66bf/theory-of-sneed)

![](https://files.catbox.moe/p6c06p.png)

still lots to do to establish FoS discussion platforms, and certainly Ruqqus won't be part of it
author.bio_html:
Ruqqus is a fraud

still lots to do to establish FoS discussion platforms, and certainly Ruqqus won't be part of it

body:
it's there for the convenience of admins and against the interests and security of the users, which is completely dismissed or disregarded

this sort of pattern is pervasive in salient Ruqqus admin behaviour, and it's the typical spiral in this sort of sites, just much sooner than usual

PS: I've deleted my discord and I no longer participate there (used to be there under the moniker "nachik")
body_html:
